Summary: saw ufo stationary overhead-then shot off-and stopped before slowly moving into clouds
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside and saw what I first thought was a plane going over....we get them all the time, but there was no noise!, Then I noticed it was stationary.I saw 2 white lights on either side and a red light on top of what looked like a Dimond or triangle. As I watched it shot off to a distance directly to the North of me, and stopped again. It stayed there long enough for my wife to get a set of binoculars...whereby we saw the two white lights with a red light on top with the lights coming together and then separating..it then slowly moved sideways and up into the clouds...
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 19th 2009
